sourcesContent:
import React, {Fragment} from "react"
import Input from "../../UI/Input"
import classes from './MealForm.module.css'

const MealForm = () => {

    return <form className={classes.form}>
        <Input label="Amount" input = {{
            id:'amount' + props.id,
            type:'number',
            min:'1',
            max:'5',
            step:'1',
            defaultValue:'1'

        }}/>
        <button>+ Add</button>
    </form>

}

export default MealForm
